name: Rob Lucci
text: On Play: You may return 3 cards from your trash to the bottom of your deck in any order. Your opponent discards 1 card from their hand. Then, your opponent places 1 card from their trash to the bottom of their deck.

effect.text: You may return 3 cards from your trash to the bottom of your deck in any order. Your opponent discards 1 card from their hand. Then, your opponent places 1 card from their trash to the bottom of their deck.
